messages.title: Fixing the economy - and creating more jobs and apprenticeships
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have helped businesses create 1.9 million more private sector jobs, and have delivered a record rise in apprenticeships.

messages.title: Protecting spending on nurseries, schools and colleges
messages.content: £400 Income Tax cut for 26 million local workers.

messages.title: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS
messages.content: The Lib Dems are planning to increase spending on the NHS by £8 billion a year by 2020 and put mental health treatment on an equal footing with that of physical health.

messages.title: £40million improvements at Sheffield Children's Hospital
messages.content: An exciting new wing is being built at Sheffield Children's Hospital which will provide new wards, a new outpatients department and better accommodation for parents staying with children. Nick Clegg launched the building work of the project.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating more private sector jobs and increasing apprenticeships.
Income Tax cut for local workers.
Increase spending on the NHS by £8 billion a year by 2020, with a focus on mental health.
Investing £40 million in improvements at Sheffield Children's Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives can't win here. Tactical voting sentiment.

issues.economy: Fixing the economy by creating more jobs and apprenticeships.
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for the NHS. Mental health treatment on equal footing with physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Nick - he's the best choice for our area.

quotes.text: Nick and the Lib Dems really engage with our local community.

images.caption: Nick Clegg at building work at Sheffield Children's Hospital.
